author: ET Online
title: Some countries are already bracing for a second wave of coronavirus infections - Economic Times
description: As travel restrictions are slowly eased in may parts of the world, countries fear travellers who might have picked up the virus elsewhere, may cause another spurt of the disease in the country. A sudden rise in asymptomatic cases, those who test positive but …
content:
While the full havoc of this global bout of coronavirus contagion is yet to play out in its entirety, some countries have already begun preparing for a second wave of infections.
